sourcesContent:
Device ID
CID
MB
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.css"], }) export class AppComponent { title = "myApp"; public rowList: any = []; public sqlTextOpenAccount = ""; public sqlTextRegistration = ""; public sqlTextProfiles = ""; public sqlTextDeposits = ""; public inp = ""; ngOnInit() { this.addRow("", "", ""); } addRow(dvId: string, cId: string, mb: string) { // var st = document.getElementById("dvId-"+(this.rowList.length-1).toString())?.ariaValueText // console.log("dvId ==> ", dvId); var row = { dvId: dvId.trim(), cId: cId.trim(), mb: mb.trim() }; this.rowList = [...this.rowList, row]; } generate() { var st = (document.getElementById("dvId-0")); console.log("dvId ==> ", st.value); console.log("HELLO", this.rowList); for (let i in this.rowList) { if (i == "0") { continue; } var data = this.rowList[i]; if (data.dvId != "") { this.sqlTextOpenAccount += `delete from tbl_staged_open_account where lower(device_id) = '${data.dvId}';` + "\n"; } } } }
